content.question: Lines 8-9 (Dardanio . . . secutus) tell us that

choices.label: Dardanus was a very brave hero
Aeneas added Dardanus to his allies
Misenus was an ally of Aeneas

content.answer: Misenus was an ally of Aeneas

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
